Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory54.jpg'}
{3: '(Static)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...About time. Finally got a hold of you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Lucia! Lucia! I've finished up here! I'm on my way back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But... You're too late...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No problem! I've finished up my mission and have the perfect Christmas tree!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Let me guess... You got a little carried away?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...The White Kuroro are all used up, and Lee's frame is overheating.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Karenina and the commandant are waiting for the next phase.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But the main problem is... you going MIA like that... We were worried sick.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Okay! I get it! I get it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I got a little carried away...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's okay. I know I messed up. But I'll make it up to you! I'll bring back the most perfect bestest Christmas! Full speed ahead!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What ornaments are you going to decorate the tree with?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ornaments...!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Huh? Aren't you planning to decorate the tree? A Christmas tree without ornaments is just a naked tree! Even I know that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'We need lights, gifts, stockings, and sorts of other stuff!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right. We can't forget to decorate it. Thanks for reminding me, Nanami.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well, DUH! I'm awesome like that. Hehehehe!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But where are we gonna get decorations in a place like this? My brain hurts just thinking about it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If you can't decorate the Christmas tree and make it pretty, I'm gonna be upset... Hurry, Lucia! Think of something!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Anything around you we can use?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There's just stumps and rocks here! What else is there?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...What about decorating it with Kuroro cogs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No, no, no! What's special about that?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How about we carve some animals out of wood?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huhâ€”? Who decorates a Christmas tree like that? No one!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're thinking about it all wrong! You've got a lousy taste, Lucia...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Well then, what do you suggest?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ughhhhh... Leave it to me! I'll bring back the most bestest and prettiest Christmas tree ever!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's what she promised... But I got a bad feeling about this...", 4: '1'}
